item.title: On Saying No
item.description: Why say no This chapter is primarily focused towards academics conducting research. While it may apply to other fields, it discusses choosing which studies to conduct, which may be a privilege not afforded to other jobs. For this reason, please feel free to skip this chapter if you’d like.^[Academics who have more hourly tweets than lifetime publications should stop reading this chapter and start writing more papers.] Academia is built on uncertainty.
